items.sentence: Tom needs to get himself out of there as fast as possible.
Let\'s hope Tom doesn\'t try to do that without some help.
Tom seems to always say the right thing at the right time.
I\'m going back to Boston as soon as this meeting is over.
I\'m not the only one who volunteered to help Tom do that.
Tom was able to speak French well enough to be understood.
I should\'ve told Tom that I wasn\'t planning to be there.
If he had been there, I could have given him your message.
The problem is that Tom doesn\'t want to sit next to Mary.
For the record, Tom didn\'t have anything to do with this.
